db:article.db:para: An instrumentation framework for building dynamic analysis tools.
Used on Linux ond MacOS in the Qt Test module.
The sources can be found in qtbase/src/testlib/3rdparty/valgrind_p.h and qtbase/src/testlib/3rdparty/callgrind_p.h.
